title: Sweetheart Annie
body: So my friend recently bought me Sweetheart Annie, (Like 30 minutes ago). So I played a game with the skin, and I was surprised to see that I was pretty much playing Marie Antoinette that had fire powers. I would like to know if you could possibly fix Annie's hair and make it blonde like in the splashart, and Make it less... chunkier I guess would be the word. The splashart looks really nice but in game it doesn't look that well.

replies.body:
Hey ImortalLyfe,

We don't have plans to made adjustments to Sweetheart Annie at this time.
